text: British diver Tom Daley and his husband Dustin Lance Black have become parents. The celebrity couple revealed the birth of their son, Robert Ray, in a notice printed in The Times, the same newspaper in which they announced their 2015 engagement. ` ` On 27th June 2018 to Thomas Robert Daley and Dustin Lance Black, a son, Robert Ray,'' it read. The couple had revealed they were expecting a child through a surrogate on Valentine's Day, and said they did not know who the biological father would be after fertilising ` ` half the eggs each''. The three - time world champion diver has also said he wants to be as good a dad as his father, who was also called Robert and died in 2011.
